titleStmt.title: A sermon preach'd at Crosby-Square, Jan. 8, 1692 upon the funeral of that faithful servant of Christ, Mr. John Reynolds, who died in the Lord the preceding 25 Decemb. / by Samuel Slater ...
titleStmt.author: Slater, Samuel, d. 1704.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
